channel.title: Titles missing
channel.description:
Is it suppose to be like this:
[url]https://i.imgur.com/QcN3Q.jpg[/url] [url]https://i.imgur.com/PlLK2.jpg[/url]
During the intro sequence, I was getting "#BMS_Title" and others like it. When I first arrived and it was supposed to say the chapter name; it said "#BMS_Chapter" or something similar. Don't recall exact words.

item.title: Titles missing
item.dc:creator: nJoy
item.description:
Thanks, renaming the folder to “BMS” fixed it.

Read full topic

item.title: Titles missing
item.dc:creator: Zat
item.description:
For me, it was fixed by renaming the mod folder under Sourcemods as “BMS”. An odd issue but an easy fix.

Read full topic

item.title: Titles missing
item.dc:creator: Aikari_Tsero
item.description:
Its because the file is called bms_english.txt, and the game is looking for blackmesa_english.txt.

ILocalize::AddFile() failed to load file "resource/BlackMesa_english.txt".

Just rename the file in /resource/ and it will work.

Read full topic

item.title: Titles missing
item.dc:creator: GRIM.657
item.description:
yep, also happening for me

Read full topic

item.title: Titles missing
item.dc:creator: 64fanatic
item.description:
Same problem. If I recall its either a missing file or a console command I have to type to re-gen it, I forget.

Read full topic

item.title: Titles missing
item.dc:creator: Zat
item.description:
Yeah, I’ve got the exact same issue. All chapter titles and save messages as well as that menu you screencaptured show up like that.

It sort of doesn’t really matter at all, though, since the mod as a whole plays just fine (and is excellent!) but if there’s a simple solution, I’d love to hear it.

Read full topic
